short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Playing with piano is now on you finger tips in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will update your search settings and will change your new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.

Get instant access to a fun piano, plus web search, free on your Chrome New Tab.

By Clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing Pianoic extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use https://www.pianoic.co/terms.html and privacy policy https://www.pianoic.co/policy.html
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.pianoic.co/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.pianoic.co/terms.html
Policy - https://www.pianoic.co/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.pianoic.co/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove us from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the one you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
